channel.title: Couple Questions [Help lol]
channel.description:
hi i just ahve a couple nooby questions first...
1. Changing the home area and putting npcs there. 2. Adding specials to weapons. 3. Making barrage freeze.
3 quesitons please respond

item.title: Couple Questions [Help lol]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“coaco260, post:1, topic:257866”]hi i just ahve a couple nooby questions first…

  1. Changing the home area and putting npcs there.
  2. Adding specials to weapons.
  3. Making barrage freeze.

3 quesitons please respond[/quote]

  1. Player.java, and for NPCs autospawn.cfg

  2. Self-Explanatory, just look at other special attack methods.

  3. In your ice barrage methods:

castOnPlayer.uberentangle();

Read full topic
